00009 /* states of a node:
00010    - unvalidated
00011    - invalid
00012    - valid (not layed out)
00013    - drawn (layout() has been called)
00014 
00015    What can be validated in a node?
00016    - attribute tags
00017    - attribute content
00018    - number of child elements
00019    - child elements
00020    - content of character data
00021 
00022    Each item that can be validated can be changed. For each of the changable
00023    items a function determning in advance if a change will result in a valid
00024    node is desirable for user interfaces: an action that could result in an
00025    invalid DOM shoulc be disabled.
00026    Ideally, invalid content should be stopped at the gates, but this is not
00027    always possible. For example, if a certain node requires two children,
00028    one has to be added first, creating an invalid element, until the second one
00029    is added.
00030 */
00031 
00032 MMLNode::MMLNode(MMLDocument * const o)
00033                 : owner(o) {
00034         parent = 0;
00035         prev = next = 0;
00036         first = last = 0;
00037         valid = true;
00038         validated = false;
00039         inferred = false;
00040 
00041         gui = new NodeGUI;
00042         gui->x = gui->y = gui->width = gui->ascent = gui->descent = 0;
00043         gui->selected = false;
00044         gui->firstviewport = gui->lastviewport = -1;
00045 }
00046 MMLNode::~MMLNode() {
00047         delete gui;
00048 }
00049 bool
00050 MMLNode::validate() {
00051         valid = true;
00052         if (!first || validated) return valid;
00053         validated = true;
00054 
00055         MMLNode *node = first;
00056         do {
00057                 valid = node->validate();
00058         } while (valid && node++ != last);
00059         return valid;
00060 }
00061 MMLNode *
00062 MMLNode::parentNode_() const {
00063         MMLNode *p = parent;
00064         while (p && p->inferred) {
00065                 p = p->parent;
00066         }
00067         return p;
00068 }
00069 /* return the first child of this node.
00070    if the first node is inferred but not completely inferred,
00071    the node's firstChild() is returned.
00072    if a the first node is allinferred, the next one is returned and so on. */
00073 MMLNode *
00074 MMLNode::firstChild_() const {
00075         MMLNode *node = first;
00076         MMLNode *fc = 0;
00077         // if a node is inferred, maybe one of it's children is not
00078         for (node = first; !fc && node; node = node->next) {
00079                 fc = node;
00080                 if (fc && fc->inferred) {
00081                         fc = fc->firstChild();
00082                 }
00083         }
00084         return fc;
00085 }
00086 MMLNode *
00087 MMLNode::lastChild_() const {
00088         MMLNode *node = last;
00089         MMLNode *lc = 0;
00090 
00091         // if a node is inferred, maybe one of it's children is not
00092         for (node = last; !lc && node; node = node->prev) {
00093                 lc = node;
00094                 if (lc && lc->inferred) {
00095                         lc = lc->lastChild();
00096                 }
00097         }
00098 
00099         return lc;
00100 }
00101 // return the first 'next' that is not inferred
00102 // if you want the inferred one, just use 'next'
00103 MMLNode *
00104 MMLNode::nextSibling_() const {
00105         const MMLNode *node = this;
00106         MMLNode *ns;
00107 
00108         // first look on this level
00109         do {
00110                 node = ns = node->next;
00111                 if (ns && ns->inferred) {
00112                         ns = ns->firstChild();
00113                 }
00114         } while (!ns && node);
00115 
00116         // and if the parent is inferred, on one level lower
00117         if (!ns && parent && parent->inferred) {
00118                 ns = parent->nextSibling();
00119         }
00120 
00121         return ns;
00122 }
00123 MMLNode *
00124 MMLNode::previousSibling_() const {
00125         const MMLNode *node = this;
00126         MMLNode *ps;
00127 
00128         // first look on this level
00129         do {
00130                 node = ps = node->prev;
00131                 if (ps && ps->inferred) {
00132                         ps = ps->lastChild();
00133                 }
00134         } while (!ps && node);
00135 
00136         if (!ps && parent && parent->inferred) {
00137                 ps = parent->previousSibling();
00138         }
00139         return ps;
00140 }
00141 MMLNode *
00142 MMLNode::insertBefore(MMLNode *newChild, MMLNode *refChild) {
00143         if (!newChild) return 0;
00144         // whatever happens next, this node is changed and needs to be
00145         // revalidated
00146         validated = false;
00147         // If refChild is null, insert newChild at the end of the list of children.
00148         if (!refChild) {
00149                 appendChild(newChild);
00150                 return newChild;
00151         }
00152         if (newChild->owner != owner) {
00153                 // WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR
00154                 errmsg = "Node was created from a different document.";
00155                 valid = false;
00156                 validated = true;
00157                 return newChild;
00158         }
00159         if (refChild->parent != this) {
00160                 // NOT_FOUND_ERR
00161                 errmsg = "Ref node is no child of this node.";
00162                 valid = false;
00163                 validated = true;
00164                 return newChild;
00165         }
00166         // If the newChild is already in the tree, it is first removed.
00167         if (newChild->parent) {
00168                 newChild->parent->removeChild(newChild);
00169         }
00170         // update relevant pointers
00171         newChild->parent = this;
00172         newChild->next = refChild;
00173         newChild->prev = refChild->prev;
00174         if (first == refChild) {
00175                 first = newChild;
00176         } else {
00177                 refChild->prev->next = newChild;
00178         }
00179         refChild->prev = newChild;
00180         return newChild;
00181 }
00182 MMLNode *
00183 MMLNode::appendChild(MMLNode *newChild) {
00184         if (!newChild) return 0;
00185         if (newChild->owner != owner) {
00186                 // WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR
00187                 errmsg = "Node was created from a different document.";
00188                 assert(0);
00189                 valid = false;
00190                 validated = true;
00191                 return newChild;
00192         }
00193         validated = false;
00194         if (newChild->parent) {
00195                 newChild->parent->removeChild(newChild);
00196         }
00197         newChild->parent = this;
00198         newChild->next = 0;
00199         if (last) {
00200                 newChild->prev = last;
00201                 last->next = newChild;
00202                 last = newChild;
00203         } else {
00204                 newChild->prev = 0;
00205                 first = last = newChild;
00206         }
00207         return newChild;
00208 }
00209 MMLNode *
00210 MMLNode::removeChild(MMLNode *oldChild) {
00211         if (!oldChild) return 0;
00212         if (oldChild->parent != this) {
00213                 // NOT_FOUND_ERR
00214                 errmsg = "Node is no child of this node.";
00215                 valid = false;
00216                 validated = true;
00217                 return oldChild;
00218         }
00219         validated = false;
00220         MMLNode *n = oldChild->next;
00221         MMLNode *p = oldChild->prev;
00222 
00223         if (p) {
00224                 p->next = n;
00225         } else {
00226                 first = n;
00227         }
00228         if (n) {
00229                 n->prev = p;
00230         } else {
00231                 last = p;
00232         }
00233         oldChild->parent = 0;
00234         oldChild->next = 0;
00235         oldChild->prev = 0;
00236         return oldChild;
00237 }

00250 /* return x position relative to non-inferred parent */
00251 float
00252 MMLNode::getX() const {
00253         MMLNode *p;
00254         p = this->parent;
00255         float gx = gui->x;
00256         while (p && p->isInferred()) {
00257                 gx += p->gui->x;
00258                 p = p->parent;
00259         }
00260         return gx;
00261 }
00262 /* return y position relative to non-inferred parent */
00263 float
00264 MMLNode::getY() const {
00265         MMLNode *p;
00266         p = this->parent;
00267         float gy = gui->y;
00268         while (p && p->isInferred()) {
00269                 gy += p->gui->y;
00270                 p = p->parent;
00271         }
00272         return gy;
00273 }

00294 void
00295 MMLNode::printTree(int level) const {
00296         for (int i=0; i<level; ++i) cout << "   ";
00297         if (inferred) {
00298                 cout << "(" << nodeName() << ")";
00299         } else {
00300                 cout << nodeName();
00301         }
00302         if (isText()) {
00303                 const MMLText *t = static_cast<const MMLText *>(this);
00304                 cout << ": '" << t->data().utf8() << "'";
00305         }
00306         cout << endl;
00307         for (MMLNode *n = first; n; n = n->next) {
00308                 n->printTree(level+1);
00309         }
00310 }
00311 bool
00312 MMLNode::drawInViewPort(ushort v) const {
00313         return gui->firstviewport == -1 || gui->lastviewport == -1
00314                 || (v >= gui->firstviewport && v <= gui->lastviewport);
00315 }
00316 bool
00317 MMLNode::fit() const {
00318         MMLViewPort *vp = owner->currentView();
00319         vp->translate(gui->x, gui->y);
00320         bool fit = true;
00321         if (!first) { // no children
00322                 fit = vp->fit(gui->width, gui->ascent, gui->descent);
00323                 if (fit) {
00324                         vp->add(gui->width, gui->ascent, gui->descent);
00325                         gui->firstviewport =
00326                                 gui->lastviewport = owner->currentViewNo();
00327                 }
00328         } else { // try to fit all children
00329                 MMLNode *n;
00330                 for (n = first; fit && n; n = n->next) {
00331                         // if not completely fitted in any viewport yet
00332                         if (n->gui->lastviewport == -1) {
00333                                 fit = n->fit();
00334                         }
00335                 }
00336                 gui->firstviewport = first->gui->firstviewport;
00337                 gui->lastviewport = last->gui->lastviewport;
00338         }
00339         vp->translate(-gui->x, -gui->y);
00340         return fit;
00341 }
